response.original_title: Resisting Mr. Lloyd: An Age Gap Romance
response.overview: Facing family pressure to quit college and marry, Clarisse's world changes when she meets Austin, the CEO of Lloyd Group after helping his grandmother after a scam. Learning about her financial struggles, he offers her money in exchange for a fake marriage to fulfill his grandmother's wish. They form an unexpected alliance, while Austin keep his true identity a secret from her.
response.title: Resisting Mr. Lloyd: An Age Gap Romance
